snippet: The House should approve the full range of reform in the Senate bill that bans insider trading.
abstract: Editorial encourages House Republican leaders to adopt the full range of reform in the Senate bill that would ban insider trading by members of Congress; notes the current House bill lacks two essential provisions without which corruption is likely to continue.
lead_paragraph: The House should approve the full range of reform in the Senate bill that bans insider trading.

headline.seo: The House’s Less Persuasive Ban on Insider Trading
headline.main: The House’s Less Persuasive Ban on Insider Trading
headline.print_headline: The House’s Less Persuasive Ban on Insider Trading
